label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added support for using the configuration reloader TLS and basic authentication with Prometheus/Alertmanager webConfigFile.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added support for OpenStack Service Discovery to the ScrapeConfig CRD.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added support for all settings of the Kubernetes Service Discovery to the ScrapeConfig CRD.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added support for proxy settings to the ScrapeConfig CRD.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added the enableHTTP2 field to remote-write configuration.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added .spec.maximumStartupDurationSeconds to the Prometheus and PrometheusAgent CRDs.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added the ability to emit events for invalid configurations in the Prometheus Operator. The operator now generates Kubernetes events when a resource is rejected due to an invalid configuration.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added additionalLabels field to topology spread constraints for Prometheus and PrometheusAgent CRD.
